Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: cash provided by used in financing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
payment for contingent consideration liability financing activities
payment tax withholding share based payment arrangement and payment for excise tax payments on share repurchases
payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of senior long term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock
payments for repurchase of other equity

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
payments to acquire interest in subsidiaries and affiliates
paymentsto acquire businesses including contingent payments netof cash acquired
Net Cash from Investing Activities: cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from divestiture of businesses net of cash divested
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Purchases of Investments: payments for proceeds from short term investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect
effect of change in cash and equivalents discontinued operations

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in other current assets
increase decrease in other current liabilities
increase decrease in other noncurrent assets and liabilities net
Depreciation and Amortization: amortizationof intangible assets including discontinued operation
Net Cash from Operating Activities: cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in continuing operations
net cash provided by used in discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in operating activities
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on sale of business
gain loss resulting from sale of disposal group including discontinued operations
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
pension expense reversal of expense noncash
restructuring lease impairment charges and other

__unmapped__: disposition of businesses and property and equipment
payment tax withholding share based payment arrangement and payment for contingent consideration liability financing activities
